challenge.title: Guerrilla Girls - The Guerrilla Girls' Bedside Companion to the History of Western Art
challenge.description: Guerrilla Girls's Bedside Companion to the History of Western Art is a book about women and the Western Art Canon's prioritization of male artists and male perspective.
challenge.instructions: Read Guerrilla Girls's Bedside Companion to the History of Western Art on Archive.org.
